name: 9 Lives (Saturnaut)
description:
My entry for MiniJam 43: Travel

Made from scratch in 72 hours.

You play as a cat! Get to the end. Collect catnip on the way - it gives you the zoomies!

Should work with gamepads, d-pad to move, Y/B or X/A to jump, right bumper or trigger to dash.

Keyboardists use arrow keys, X to jump, space to dash.

Press escape to end the game.

Press R to restart.

12/16/19 Update: Fixed some bugs.
